title: HashiCorp wins the Datadog Partner Network Integration Developer Partner of the Year Award
content:
For the second year in a row, HashiCorp has won the Datadog Partner Network (DPN) Integration Developer Partner of the Year Award. Datadog, the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications, unveiled the award winners at its DASH conference earlier today.

The DPN award winners were chosen based on the partners’ revenue contribution and growth, product and services expansion, and their proven commitment to providing customers with the innovation, services, and support needed to build and scale their businesses.

HashiCorp was selected as the DPN Integration Developer Partner of the Year for its work with Datadog’s product and marketing teams to create integrated solutions for joint customers and go-to-market campaigns. In 2023, HashiCorp and Datadog launched the new HCP Boundary and HCP Packer integrations, providing comprehensive visibility into infrastructure access. The HCP Boundary integration provides real-time audit log streaming and out-of-the-box dashboard monitoring of the health and performance of Boundary instances, while the HCP Packer integration permits near real-time streaming of audit events using Datadog. HashiCorp also collaborated with Datadog to host webinars, field events, virtual events, and other go-to-market activities around the world.

"We have been working with Datadog since 2015, providing valuable joint solutions to our customers,” said Alex Cahn, Manager of HashiCorp’s Technology Partner Alliances Team. “Our recent collaborations with HCP Boundary and HCP Packer integrations augments the full stack of HashiCorp products already supported, including Vault, Consul, Terraform, and Nomad. We are delighted to be awarded Datadog Integration Developer Partner of the Year for the second time in a row. We look forward to continuing our work together, building new integrations, and strengthening our partnership to benefit our mutual customers,” Cahn added.

The Datadog Partner Network

“DASH brings together Datadog customers and partners to connect and showcase best practices in observability and security. It’s an honor to present our global partners with awards at the event,” said Adam Blitzer, Chief Operating Officer at Datadog. “The companies recognized this year are committed to innovation and delivering value to their customers. Congratulations to all the winners on this achievement and thank you for your continued partnership with Datadog.”

The Datadog Partner Network (DPN) is made up of Sales and Services Partners as well as Technology Partners. Sales and Services Partners include managed service providers, resellers, and consultants. These businesses manage end-customer environments while incorporating Datadog into their service offerings, resell Datadog’s services to customers, and leverage their Datadog expertise by providing short-term consulting services. Technology Partners offer integrations and complementary technologies or services to help customers achieve immediate time to value. Technology Partners can choose to list their offerings on Datadog’s community integrations page and commercial marketplace.

Learn more about the HashiCorp-Datadog partnership

Please visit HashiCorp at the Datadog DASH Conference — Booth 730 — to learn more about our cloud platform solutions for automated infrastructure management. You can explore all the HashiCorp integrations with Datadog on our Datadog partner page.
author: Alejandra Velasquez
